title: How far does Vladimir Putin's account of the Soviet Union's dealings with Nazi Germany drift from the historical record? - Quora

response.answer_text: Putin's account boils down to the following concept: “it was a dirty job (clinch with the Nazis and cut an extra buffer in Poland, before they attacked us), but someone had to do it"). And this, after all, is a realistic way to see the things… There's nothing in history which can prove the opposite…
